# hw_cookie (Resource)

A sweet treat resource that brings joy to any configuration. Perfect for learning simple resource management while indulging in the simple pleasures of baked goods.

*Warm from the oven,*
*Chocolate chips melting soft,*
*Sweet comfort found.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `kind` (String) The kind of cookie (e.g., chocolate chip, oatmeal, sugar, snickerdoodle)

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the cookie resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Cookie identifier
- `price` (Number) The price of the cookie in dollars (hardcoded to $1.50)
